Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and finalize the presentation materials based on the week's progress.
Present the week’s narrative themes, one-page synopsis, and integration plan to the entire team for feedback and discussion.
Discuss any remaining questions or concerns with team members and gather additional insights to refine the narrative.
Create a final checklist covering all narrative elements that need to be addressed moving forward into the next week.

Reflect on the week’s accomplishments, jotting down any personal notes for improvement and ideas for the next phase of narrative development.
